name: Dagger
description: A fast dependency injector for Android and Java.

name: LoganSquare
description: The fastest JSON parsing and serializing library available for Android.

name: Nucleus
description: Nucleus is a simple Android library, which utilizes the Model-View-Presenter pattern to properly connect background tasks with visual parts of an application.

name: Picasso
description: A powerful image downloading and caching library for Android.

name: Retrofit
description: Type-safe HTTP client for Android and Java by Square, Inc.

name: RxJava
description: RxJava is a Java VM implementation of Reactive Extensions: a library for composing asynchronous and event-based programs by using observable sequences.

name: Timber
description: This is a logger with a small, extensible API which provides utility on top of Android's normal Log class.

name: LeakCanary
description: A memory leak detection library for Android and Java.
